post.description:
Uploads a file as a draft attachment and returns a UUID that can be used when creating emails.

**File Limits:**
- Maximum file size: 50MB per file
- Maximum total size: 100MB per email
- Maximum files per request: 10

**Supported File Types:**
- PDF documents (application/pdf)
- Images: JPEG, PNG (image/jpeg, image/png)
- Documents: DOC, DOCX (application/msword, application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document)
- Text files (text/plain)
- Binary files (application/octet-stream)

**Usage:**
1. Upload file using this endpoint
2. Receive UUID in response
3. Use UUID in attachmentIds array when creating emails

**Progress Tracking:**
- Add ?track-progress=true query parameter to enable progress tracking
- Use the returned sessionId to monitor progress via /upload-progress/{sessionId}

**Security:**
- Requires authentication (JWT cookie)
- Requires CSRF token (X-XSRF-TOKEN header)
- Requires SEND_EMAIL permission

attachmentIds.description:
Array of draft attachment UUIDs to associate with this email. 
    
**Usage:**
1. Upload files using POST /api/mail/attachments
2. Get UUIDs from the response
3. Include UUIDs in this array when creating the email

**Limits:**
- Maximum 10 attachments per email
- Total size of all attachments must not exceed 100MB
- Each attachment must be a valid UUID from a previous upload

**Example:** ["123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000", "987fcdeb-51a2-43d1-b789-123456789abc"]
